    • printAllInformation

      public void printAllInformation(String CurrentP, ItemTile[][] board, int numberOfRowsBoard, int numberOfColumnsBoard, int numberOfRowsBookshelf, int numberOfColumnsBookshelf, List<ItemTile[][]> AllPlayersBookshelf, List<String> commonGoalDescription, List<Integer> commonGoalPoints, List<String> nicknames, String[][] personalGoalCard, ItemTile[][] currentPBookshelf, List<ItemTile[][]> newBook)
      Method that prints all the information of the player view.It prints the board,the player bookshelf,other players' bookshelf,the personal goal and the commons goals
      Specified by:
      printAllInformation in interface View
      Parameters:
      CurrentP - nickname of the current player
      board - the board
      numberOfRowsBoard - number of rows of the board
      numberOfColumnsBoard - number of columns of the board
      numberOfRowsBookshelf - number of rows of the bookshelf
      numberOfColumnsBookshelf - number of columns of the bookshelf
      AllPlayersBookshelf - bookshelf of all players
      commonGoalDescription - description of every common goal of the game
      commonGoalPoints - point for each common goal
      nicknames - list of all nicknames
      personalGoalCard - personal goal card of the player
      currentPBookshelf - bookshelf of the player
      newBook - bookshelf of all players, on turn excluded

    • printDisconnection

      public void printDisconnection(int type)
      Method for printing that the server or a player has disconnected
      Specified by:
      printDisconnection in interface View
      Parameters:
      type - 0 for RMI client and server crash, 1 for RMI client and player crash, 2 for socket client
